mapper.sql: P.ProductID, P.ProductCode, P.VehicleLicense, P.Remarks, P.UpdateTime, P.UpdateUserID, P.CreateTime, P.CreateUserID, P.IsDelete, P.Version

insert into gauge_product

mapper.update:
update gauge_product
ProductCode = #{productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VehicleLicense = #{vehicleLicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

UpdateUserID = #{updateUserID,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CreateTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CreateUserID = #{createUserID,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IsDelete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ProductID = #{productID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
